participant_1.background:
I am a school psychologist.
I am the youngest sibling of four.
I geocache in my spare time.
I am learning how to play the piano.
Chocolate is my favorite food.

participant_2.background:
I travel every year to disney world.
I have two dogs.
I like to read true crime novels.
I am close to both of my brothers.

content.text: Hi! I'm [user 1 name].
Hi [user 1 name]! I'm [user 2 name].
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to travel, read, and spend time with my dogs.
That sounds great! I like to geocache, play the piano, and eat chocolate.
I've never heard of geocaching. What's that?
It's a type of treasure hunt where you use a GPS device to find hidden containers.
That sounds like fun! I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a great way to explore new places.
What's your favorite place you've geocached?
I've found some really cool places, but my favorite was probably a park in the middle of nowhere. It was so peaceful and quiet, and I loved the feeling of being away from everything.
That sounds amazing! I'm definitely going to try geocaching now.
You won't regret it!
Thanks for the recommendation! What's your favorite type of music?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably classic rock.
Me too! I love Led Zeppelin and the Beatles.
Those are two of my favorites too! I also love the Rolling Stones and Pink Floyd.
We have good taste in music! What's your favorite book?
That's a tough one, but I think I'd have to say "The Catcher in the Rye" by J.D. Salinger.
That's a great book! I love how Holden Caulfield is such a complex and relatable character.
Me too! I think everyone can relate to feeling like an outsider at some point in their life.
Definitely! I'm glad we have similar taste in books.
Me too! I think it's important to have people you can relate to.
